TENURE

Describes how you own a property. There are different types of tenure - freehold, leasehold, and commonhold.Read more about tenure in our glossary page.

Freehold

Key features

Very Tastefully Improved Detached Bungalow

Great Position Close to the Village Centre

21' Living Room with Feature Fireplace

Beautifully Presented Throughout

2 Double Bedrooms with Hammonds, Custom Made Fitted Furniture

Sun Room

Well Appointed Shower Room/WC

Excellent Parking & Double Garage (Part Converted to Create Utility)

Delightful Gardens

Rear Aspect over School Playing Fields

Description

A very tastefully improved detached bungalow which occupies a great cul-de-sac position, close to the village centre and enjoys delightful gardens, along with lovely views over the School playing fields. The property itself has a very comfortable feel and provides accommodation which includes enclosed porch, hallway, 21' living room with feature fireplace, modern dining kitchen, sun room, 2 double bedrooms with Hammonds custom fitted furniture, well appointed shower room/wc, excellent parking and double garage (part converted to utility room). A property not to be missed.

This very well maintained and tastefully presented detached bungalow occupies a peaceful and highly convenient, village centre, cul de sac position being only a short walk from the thriving centre and it wide range of amenities, and along with well designed accommodation enjoys a lovely rear aspect over the adjoining school playing fields.

The property has many features of note with the block paved driveway providing excellent parking, there is an organized double ‘side by side’ garage, one of which has been partly converted into a utilty room. To the side there is also a delightful well stocked mature garden, with beds, monkey puzzle tree and vegetable garden. The rear has a pleasant paved courtyard style garden from which to enjoy the views.

The property has a very comfortable overall feel about it, and as you enter there is an enclosed porch, hallway with oak doors leading off. The 21’ living room is attractively decorated and has a feature limestone fireplace with living flame fire, the modern dining kitchen has a good arrangement of cream cabinets and with built in appliances. There is a pleasant sun room, two double bedrooms both with quality Hammonds custom fitted wardrobes and a modern fitted shower / wc.

The property has Upvc double glazing, the windows to the front only recently having been installed and there is gas central heating with combination boiler.

Poynton is a thriving community orientated village with its revitalised centre and imaginative pedestrian/vehicular shared space scheme really adding to the overall positive atmosphere. Waitrose, Morrisons, Asda all have outlets around the village and within a short car journey, Marks & Spencer and John Lewis can be found. The village itself is just within the Cheshire boundary and surrounded by Green Belt with Lyme Park and the Middlewood Way being on the doorstep. The Railway Station provides a frequent commuter service to the city centre, Stockport and Macclesfield. In terms of education, all schools around the village, including Primary and Secondary are extremely highly regarded. Other amenities of the area include canal fishing and boating at Higher Poynton, Golf Club, Tennis, Cricket and Bowling Clubs, Poynton Sports Club and Community Centre.

The rear has a pleasant paved courtyard style garden from which to enjoy the views.
